column5: anyone have any interesting or crazy stories that you saw otherw were doing while driving?  for me, when I just picked up my boat and was driving down don mills, We looked over and the guy beside us was crazy enough to be reading the newspaper over his steering while driving. I thought that was nuts, ,really worth catching up on the news while driving and risking lives? yeesh. and yes we all know about cell phone talkers..

I though i was hallucinating one day when I looked over and seen a guy with both feet up on the dash, I guess he was cruising along with cruise control, what a goof.  But his girlfriend could have been working the pedals while she was looking for something.

Paul and I were driving up north, and as we were going through Barrie, I looked in the compact car beside me and the guy driving was wear a full face helmet.  We thought that was a little odd, but had a good laugh over it.  Joey
Must have been late for hockey practice.
maybe he was a bit scared in his compact car? being rather small and fragile compared to others...
Following an erratic driver , figured he was drunk until another head popped up!
Gary!!  I ddint know that was you behind us!
